alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Le Flore; Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 12:43AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong gusty winds will impact portions of east central Haskell, southeastern Sequoyah and northern Le Flore Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1242 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated gusty winds associated with decaying thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles northeast of Keota to 3 miles west of Poteau to 4 miles southwest of Heavener. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Poteau... Pocola... Muldrow... Heavener... Roland... Spiro... Arkoma... Panama... Wister... Howe... Keota... Bokoshe... Gans... Cameron... Moffett... Lake Wister State Park... Shady Point... Rock Island... Cowlington... Heavener Runestone Park... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 312 and 328. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
